item.title: Let Revanth Reddy make 10 defected MLAs quit and re-contest, if he has faith in his work: KTR
item.description:
<![CDATA[Working president of the Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) K. T. Rama Rao expressed hope that people would deliver justice in the byelections in 10 constituencies represented by the BRS, whose MLAs after winning on the party symbol defected to the ruling Congress.
Speaking at a public meeting at Gadwal on Saturday (September 13), he reiterated that if Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy had confidence in his performance, he must make the 10 defected MLAs resign and re-contest the elections. â€œThe conditi...]]>
item.author: Authors
